title: 服务器插件问题 还是这个问题
author: Mr.Nima
txt_content:
RT我已经按照安装顺序把传送枪插件扔进了plugins文件夹里
开服 就怎么都不生成传送枪文件夹 也找不到参数设置
可是我在服务器里输入/RP却有反应 就是没有说请输入？或者HELP
求解- -

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 你下个内置修改看看有没有portalgun的东西

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
到 world 文件夾中找找... 

The Server's basic properties are saved in the world folder.
Server's have a new command which lets you change these properties while in the server.
/pg <property> <new value>
Eg: /pg turretMode 3

replies.author: Mr.Nima
replies.txt_content: 老实说没有装传送门MOD 进装了传送门插件的服务器 会不会有道具出现- -
